Advanced Surveillance Control

PTZ Cameras

Advanced Pan-Tilt-Zoom cameras with remote directional control and powerful zoom capabilities for comprehensive surveillance

IPC6424SR-X25-VF-B

4MP 25x LightHunter IR Network PTZ Camera with advanced features for bright and clear imaging in ultra-low light environments

Key Features:

  • High quality image with 4MP, 1/2.8" CMOS sensor
  • 2688×1520@30fps in main stream
  • Ultra 265, H.265, H.264, MJPEG support

IPC6432LR-X16-VG1

2MP 16X LightHunter IR Network Dome PTZ Camera with advanced features including ultra-high image quality in low light, 100m IR range, and IP66 protection

Key Features:

  • High quality image with 2MP, 1/2.8" CMOS sensor
  • 1920*1080@60fps in the main stream
  • Ultra 265, H.265, H.264, MJPEG

IPC6622SR-X25-VF

2MP 25x Lighthunter IR Network PTZ Camera with advanced features including smart intrusion prevention, people counting, and superior low-light performance

Key Features:

  • High quality image with 2MP,1/2.8'' CMOS sensor
  • 1920*1080@60fps in the main stream
  • Ultra 265, H.265, H.264, MJPEG

IPC6852ER-X45-VF

Professional PTZ camera featuring a 2MP 1/1.8'' CMOS sensor with 45X optical zoom and advanced Lighthunter technology for superior low-light performance. Ideal for large-scale surveillance with 250m IR range and IP66 protection.

Key Features:

  • High quality image with 2MP,1/1.8'' CMOS sensor
  • 1920*1080@30fps in the main stream
  • Ultra 265, H.265, H.264, MJPEG

IPC7623ER-X44-VF

2MP 44x Lighthunter IR Network Positioning system with advanced features including smart intrusion prevention, people counting, and optical defog capabilities

Key Features:

  • 2MP,1/2.8" CMOS sensor
  • 1920*1080@60fps in the main stream
  • Triple streams

IPC7628EL-L-X41-VH1

8MP 41X Lighthunter Laser Network Positioning system with advanced features including triple streams, smart intrusion prevention, and up to 1000m IR distance

Key Features:

  • 3840*2160@30fps in the main stream
  • Triple streams
  • 41X Optical Zoom
